about_the_game:
■Summary
ーI've become a Monsterー

This is the era of uploading consciousness to a server and experiencing the game world directly.
I was playing online games as usual when one day I encountered a mysterious bug that turned me into a monster.
I couldn't log out, I couldn't chat, I just wandered around in a ramshackle world.
But I had the power to break the rules of this world.

To those who mocked me here,
I'm going to get revenge on all the female players……!

With this “karma”!

The legendary work that 100,000 people were crazy about has finally descended on Steam!
Whooo!! Must buy now!!

■Game Contents
【How to play】
This work is a gutsy reincarnation RPG.
Start with weak monsters, defeat various enemies, and build up your strength......
And super exciting battle fxxks with female players!!
The best "sexperiance” for you!


【accumulate karma】
The main character is a monster. Let's do something bad!
Prey on weak animals,
Pickpocket mob players, prank them, burglarize them, and even rob banks!
If you are a female player, you can hold her down and ......?

The more evil you do, the more 'karma' you get.
If you accumulate karma, you can get it at ......?


【reincarnation】
By consuming karma, one can “reincarnate” into a total of 10 different types of monsters.

Reincarnate into a stronger monster,
Do terrible things to stronger female players,
Get more karma,

And save your strength until the day you commit that nemesis, the Knight. ......



【Hyper Exciting!! Battle fxxk!!】
Animation x Battle fxxk New system!
As with mobs, you can freely attack and fxxk heroines who are roaming around the field.
Blame【private parts】, 【buttocks】, and 【breasts】 freely in real time,
If you can make her come before she escapes, you have a chance to insert her!
Use the【High speed piston】,【Normal piston】, and【Crazy piston】 in real time to climax.
Make the heroine weaker and weaker!



■Spec
【H Scene】
Basic CGs……standing picture 12 ,HCG 28
Battle fxxk scene……12 Scene
Mob H……2 Scene
Event H Scene……21 Scene

【Other comfort systems】
・Sentence auto skip function
・Fast sentence skip function
・Map display to help you find your way(Open with the S key. There is an area that cannot be used.)
・Current objective display so you don't get lost in the game progression(Open with the D key. )
・Difficulty level change function (Easy, Normal, Hard mode)

【Full animation】
・Everything is animated, including standing pictures, H scenes, and even enemies
・『Nurunuru Mode』 that moves in 32 frames.
・『Sakusaku Mode』 that moves in 16 frames.

  • Storage: 5 GB available space
